mapper.insert: insert into post (post_name, status, userId, send_time, confirm_time, content, title, type) values (#{post_name},#{status},#{userId},now(),now(),#{content}, #{title}, type)
mapper.update: update post set title = #{title}, avatarUrl = #{avatarUrl}, content = #{content}, send_time = now(), confirm_time = now(), type = #{type} where post_name = #{post_name}
mapper.select: select u.nickName, u.avatarUrl, p.* from user_msg u, post p where p.status = #{status} and p.type = #{type} and p.userId = u.userId order by p.confirm_time desc
